Reviews.Title: So Far So Good!
Reviews.Author: whitesox2005
Reviews.Content: I purchased this laptop one month ago and I'm pleased with it so far. I paid a little more than the current sale price but happy none the less. Love the style, quick boot up and keyboard, although the black case is a magnet for fingerprints. Have not used many of the Lenovo Apps, will update later on using those. No problems so far burning DVDs and playback has been stellar. Added Microsoft Office 2013 for documents, but have also used Lenovo PDF reader with no problems. Wi-Fi performance has been just OK, have used it in only a few locations so far. Speed and performance have been great, Windows 8.1 is Ok, could be a little less cluttered but hasn't detracted from laptop performance. May update a few months from now, but very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Love
Reviews.Author: Laticia Tharrington
Reviews.Content: Love the computer but hate the OS. Great sound, great screen quality. I will admit that I am a novice when it comes to computer specs, but this is my second Lenovo and I don't think I will be returning to HP or Dell ever again.

Reviews.Title: Lenovo IdeaPad G710 17.3-Inch Laptop (59407729) Black
Reviews.Author: Jam P.
Reviews.Content: I love my new lap top.  I haven't had any issues as of yet, but I've only had it for less than a month.  It's larger than I expected, which is fine with me because it's still light weight.  The sound and picture quality is good.  Its basically average use for me at home checking email, social networking, music, videos, and work when needed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We bought one for our company and since then have bought two more ,  never had a issue and very robust item.  The screen is crisp and clear and the keyboard is very comfortable and big.  Not really a travel laptop but more of a desktop replacement.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good lap top for the price

Reviews.Title: Lenova IdeaPad G710 17.3 inch laptop
Reviews.Author: Lynn Jembrysek
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my purchase.  I read the reviews and they were all good and I went with it.  I only wish that Microsoft still had there games like Free Cell.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Vincent C.
Reviews.Content: Not a lot of bells and whistles, but solid, reliable, and stylish.  Large fan of Lenovo.  I have used or owned many products by them and this is no exception to the norm.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!!
Reviews.Author: Juan Ignacio Beade Harbin
Reviews.Content: I love this notebook, great screen, good keyboard and powerful tools. Time response it's really good and have different devices to could be used.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Luzardo L.
Reviews.Content: The product was on time and in excellent conditions... So far so good.... As expected... I hope the performance would be as good as I thought when I bought it... Thanks...

Reviews.Title: Fast Computer
Reviews.Author: Yunfei Z.
Reviews.Content: My PC runs fast and I really enjoyed the new Win 8 system! And the battery does a good job!

Reviews.Title: New computer delivered with many viruses and operational problems
Reviews.Author: William F. Kelliher
Reviews.Content: The computer came with 129 viruses.  When I contacted Lenovo support Icon I was told I had to pay $99 to clean up the computer. Now for some reason I can not get onto the internet.  I have never had such a bad experience with a new compute!!
